1.name: Spirit Blade
1.details:
Every 3rd basic attack of Blade deals additional physical damage (scaling with physical power) and a Spirit Blade will spawn where Blade is after 1 second.

Spirit Blade will stay for 10 seconds. Blade can pick up a Spirit Blade to gain increased movement speed that decays over 2 seconds, and converts a small percentage of his next basic attack damage to true damage.

It is possible to pick up multiple Spirit Blades, but Blade can only use one for each basic attack (maximum 5 Spirit Blades).

2.name: Condemn
2.details:
Blade’s next basic attack within 5 seconds deals additional physical damage (scaling with physical power).

When Blade kills an enemy with Condemn, half of the mana cost will be refunded and the cooldowns will be reduced by half.

In addition, a Spirit Blade will spawn on top of that unit.

3.name: Blade Work
3.details: Blade summons a Spirit Blade in a target location. Within 10 seconds, Blade gains increased movement speed towards all the present Spirit Blades.

4.name: Blade Surge
4.details:
Blade dashes to a Spirit Blade. Within 3 seconds, Blade's next basic attack will dash to the target enemy, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) and granting himself increased attack speed for the next 3 basic attacks.

The attack speed boost lasts for 5 seconds or until all 3 basic attacks are used.

5.name: Blade Storm
5.details:
Blade channels for 0.5 seconds, then dash to a target location, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all enemies within the path.

In addition, all the Spirit Blades will return to him during the dash, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all enemies in the path and greatly slowing them for 1 second.
